actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to delegate power to the States, through their State legislatures, to disapprove certain specified activities licensed by the Nuclear Regulatory Commission, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for full State participation in the planning, siting, and licensing of nuclear storage and disposal facilities. Authorizes the States, through their legislatures, to disapprove the site selection of any nuclear storage or disposal facility within their boundaries.

titles.title: A bill to delegate power to the States, through their State legislatures, to disapprove certain specified activities licensed by the Nuclear Regulatory Commission, and for other purposes.
